titles.title: Designating minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

Pursuant to Rule XXVIII, Mr. Conyers notified the House of his intention to offer a motion on Thursday, February 29, 1996, instructing conferees on the part of the House to insist upon the provisions contained in sec. 107 of the House passed version of the bill.

bill.summary: 2/28/1996--Introduced. Designates minority party membership on the following House Committees: (1) Transportation and Infrastructure; (2) Science; (3) International Relations; and (4) Banking and Financial Services.
